object.title: On Boarding
object.text: Onboarding is a platform that provides the associates a guide from their onboarding process and through all their career at Walmart. Includes an on boarding, Skills  and training section.

object.title: Compass
object.text: Is a web based application that is helping merchandising teams to improve decision making by simplifying operations with automated task.

object.title: Sales
object.text: The sales App provides associates with the previous hour sales information to improve merchandising and research any sales opportunities.

object.title: Managers
object.text: Managers recap is an application that helps to the store managers to consult important data and information that is available in the Managers Recap Store Report as the flash sales summary, the flash margin, the member or client count, the increment % by department and the average basket of the day.
